Package polimi.reds

Interface Summary
DispatchingService The client interface to access the REDS event service.
Filter A REDS filter.
Repliable It indicates that the message is repliable.
 

Class Summary
Message A REDS message.
MessageID It represents the Universal Unique ID of a message.
NodeDescriptor The descriptor of a REDS node (i.e., a broker or a client).
Replies This class represents a set of replies to a published message.
Reply This class is the basic template to create a reply message.
TCPDispatchingService  
 

Exception Summary
NotConnectedException This class represents an exception that has to be raised when a method in charge fo sending data to a neighboring broker is invoked while that broker is not connected.
ReplyTimeoutException This exception is thrown when the timeout expires and someone is waiting for a reply.
